Detailed Description

Class of field that changes its colour depending on neighbours or at random. To Start chaning it needs to be executed at fixed rate, best at getSpeed() speed.

Author
n1t4chi

double  colour_change_chance,
int  speed,
ReentrantLock  super_lock

Constructor.

Parameters
randRNG. [must not be null pointer]
colour_change_chancechance of field changing its colour randomly. [must be positive]
speedSpeed of changing colour. [must be within [0,1] range]
super_lockSuper lock when all fields properties are being changed.
Exceptions
IllegalArgumentExceptionif given arguments are not correct.

void sim.Field.setSpeed ( int  speed)

Sets new random speed of this field within range of [s/2 , 3/2*s], where s is given average speed.
